channel.title: How do you create trading on your server?
channel.description:
I was just wondering, how do you create tradign on your server? Like on mine it doesn't have trading yet. If there is a code to go in a certain place please post it! Thank you![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2009, 12:29:13 pm[/size][hr]Also, how do you put npc's in certain areas, and how do you make it so they teleport you to a certain place?
[PLEASE READ]-Can someone help me port foward? My Mother said we have a Roadrunner router. Is there a certain IP for that type of router? If you can help please post it!

item.title: How do you create trading on your server?
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

johno2:

www.portforward.com

How does that help me?

Read full topic
